CustomField.description:
Indicates Expense is in a state that is eligible for Billing Event Generation (not including the Approved for Billing flag, which may also be required per global config).
This means all of the following conditions must be met: Billing Hold = false Exclude from Billing = false Include In Financials = true Billable = true Billed = false Invoiced = false Billing Event Item = {blank} Project = {not blank} Project's Account = {not blank} Project Exclude From Billing = false
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates Expense is in a state that is eligible for Billing Event Generation (not including the Approved for Billing flag, which may also be required per global config).
CustomField.label: Eligible for Billing
